item.title: Abandoned car woolacombe road, 4th October
item.description:
There’s a car parked windows down in the middle of the road. I saw it first at 11am 4/10/25 then I went out again at 9pm and the car is still there parked in the middle of the road. Not sure if the owner may return

item.title: Metal screws sticking out on the kids pirate ship, 4th October
item.description:
We were made aware of them sticking as a school kid got stuck with his joggers on one of those screws last Friday, it then tore the bottom of the poor child’s joggers open. Since its a popular spot for kids on a daily basis, it requires immediate attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thurlow Park Road, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter scattered in the street, 4th October
item.description:

item.title: Adelphi Terrace Lime Bikes Left parked along the path., 4th October
item.description:
Dear FixMyStreet. I am writing to report an issue regarding Lime that have been left parked along the side of the path on Adelphi Terrace (east). These bikes are causing an obstruction, making it difficult for pedestrians and other road users to pass safely. I kindly request that this matter be investigated, and appropriate action taken to ensure the path remains clear and accessible to all. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Adelphi Terrace, Waterloo, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
